mapper.sql: user_id, sex, birthday, address, degree, profession_title, dept_id, dept_name, skill_info, yprice, price, speciality, type, describe_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, state
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as user_id, u.name_, d.profession_title, o.orgName, d.dept_name, d.skill_info, d.describe_ FROM sys_org o LEFT JOIN sys_user u on o.id = u.org_id LEFT JOIN sys_doctor d on d.user_id = u.id WHERE o.id = #{orgId}

select u.id as user_id, u.name_, d.profession_title, o.orgName, d.dept_name, d.skill_info, d.describe_ from tb_user_doctor_relation r LEFT JOIN sys_doctor d on d.user_id = r.doctor_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on d.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_org o on o.id = u.org_id where r.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_doctor (user_id, sex, birthday, address, degree, profession_title, dept_id, dept_name, skill_info, yprice, price, speciality, type, describe_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, state) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{professionTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skillInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_doctor
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
degree = #{degree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
profession_title = #{professionTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_info = #{skillInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yprice = #{yprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},

describe_ = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
